Plintissa leaps in front of Iron Raptor! Plintissa pulls out her gun to fire
at the blasts, but the gun doesn't work! It had been sabotaged! Plintissa
was hit with the brunt of the blasts and fell to the ground injured. Dracona
jumped over the shots and fired an ice beam into the sky, making it hail
above Zenyak, hopefully making him lose his balance and slip. Dracona fired
a fire beam at Zenyak...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 04, 2000 4:35 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Zenyak::
>
> "Repairs at ... 73 percent." Zenyak's internal computer reports. Zenyak
opens
> his eyes. He was still laying outside of the Ark, it seemed.
>
> He sits up, rubbing his head. Taking a few steps, Zenyak sees Iron Raptor
> talking to two bots. He growls. He never missed an opportunity to kill
> maximals. Taking out an automatic plasma rifle, he jumps forward, firing
at
> Iron Raptor, Plintissa, and Dracona.
>
